text: Margit Pályi (21 October 1908 - 1996) was a Hungarian gymnast. She competed in the women's artistic team all-around event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Hungarian female artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Hungary Category:Gymnasts at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: Margit Pályi
